Longsword.Name: Longsword
Longsword.Description: A versatile blade favored by warriors and knights.

Shortsword.Name: Shortsword
Shortsword.Description: A light, easily handled sword favored by rogues and swashbucklers.

Dagger.Name: Dagger
Dagger.Description: A small but deadly blade, easily concealed.

Mace.Name: Mace
Mace.Description: A heavy metal head on a reinforced handle.

Staff.Name: Staff
Staff.Description: A wooden staff used by mages and mystics.

Hunter's Bow.Name: Hunter's Bow
Hunter's Bow.Description: A sturdy shortbow with carefully maintained string and grip.

Arrow (20).Name: Arrow (20)
Arrow (20).Description: A bundle of 20 arrows with steel heads.

Wooden Shield.Name: Wooden Shield
Wooden Shield.Description: A sturdy wooden shield reinforced with metal bands.

Leather Armor.Name: Leather Armor
Leather Armor.Description: Light armor made of treated leather.

Studded Leather Armor.Name: Studded Leather Armor
Studded Leather Armor.Description: Leather armor reinforced with metal studs.

Ringmail Armor.Name: Ringmail Armor
Ringmail Armor.Description: Heavy armor made of interlocking metal rings.

Robes.Name: Robes
Robes.Description: Comfortable robes with subtle magical enhancements.

Backpack.Name: Backpack
Backpack.Description: A sturdy backpack for carrying equipment.

Bedroll.Name: Bedroll
Bedroll.Description: A comfortable sleeping roll for camping.

Effect.Rest: Advantage on recovery during long rest

Tinderbox.Name: Tinderbox
Tinderbox.Description: Steel, flint, and tinder for starting fires.

Rope (50 feet).Name: Rope (50 feet)
Rope (50 feet).Description: Strong hemp rope suitable for climbing or binding.

Torch.Name: Torch
Torch.Description: A wooden torch that provides light for 1 hour.

Effect.Light: Bright light 20 ft., dim light 20 ft.

Waterskin.Name: Waterskin
Waterskin.Description: A leather container that holds water.

Component Pouch.Name: Component Pouch
Component Pouch.Description: A small pouch containing spell components.

Thieves Tools.Name: Thieves Tools
Thieves Tools.Description: Tools for picking locks and disarming traps.

Holy Symbol.Name: Holy Symbol
Holy Symbol.Description: A divine focus for casting spells.

Merchant's Scale.Name: Merchant's Scale
Merchant's Scale.Description: A precise balance scale for weighing coins and valuable materials.

Effect.Skill: Advantage on checks to determine item value

Climber's Kit.Name: Climber's Kit
Climber's Kit.Description: A set of tools for climbing and rappelling.

Effect.Skill: Advantage on checks to climb or rappel

Cooking Pot.Name: Cooking Pot
Cooking Pot.Description: A sturdy metal pot for cooking meals.

Mess Kit.Name: Mess Kit
Mess Kit.Description: A set of utensils for eating meals on the go.

Crystal Heart Shard.Name: Crystal Heart Shard
Crystal Heart Shard.Description: A fragment of the ancient Crystal Heart, pulsing with raw magical energy.

Effect.Detection: Resonates with nearby Crystal Heart pieces
Effect.Light: Pulses with dim light when magic is nearby
Effect.Lore: Part of the shattered Crystal Heart of the ancient civilization

Captain's Sword.Name: Captain's Sword
Captain's Sword.Description: A masterwork longsword bearing Northhold's crest, marking its wielder as a person of authority.

Effect.Authority: Advantage on social checks with Northhold guards
Effect.Lore: Traditional symbol of authority in Northhold's guard

Crystal Staff.Name: Crystal Staff
Crystal Staff.Description: A wooden staff crowned with a resonating crystal that hums with magical energy.

Effect.Resonance: Can detect magical anomalies within 30 feet
Effect.Lore: Created by the crystal mystics of the underground caves

Resonance Stone.Name: Resonance Stone
Resonance Stone.Description: A crystal that vibrates in harmony with nearby magical energies.

Effect.Attunement: Can be attuned to specific magical signatures
Effect.Lore: Used by crystal mystics to navigate the magical currents

Crystal Pendant.Name: Crystal Pendant
Crystal Pendant.Description: A crystal from the mystic caves, wrapped in intricate silver wire.

Shadowweave Cloak.Name: Shadowweave Cloak
Shadowweave Cloak.Description: A cloak made from fabric that seems to drink in light, making its wearer harder to spot.

Effect.Stealth: Advantage on Stealth checks in dim light or darkness

Runescribed Shield.Name: Runescribed Shield
Runescribed Shield.Description: A wooden shield covered in glowing protective runes.

Effect.Reaction: Once per day, can use reaction to add +2 AC against one attack

Merchant's Fortune Ring.Name: Merchant's Fortune Ring
Merchant's Fortune Ring.Description: A golden ring with a small emerald that helps in business dealings.

Effect.Insight: Advantage on Insight checks during trades
Effect.Persuasion: Advantage on Persuasion checks for price negotiation

Wanderer's Compass.Name: Wanderer's Compass
Wanderer's Compass.Description: A compass that points toward the holder's greatest desire rather than north.

Effect.Navigation: Points toward user's chosen destination once attuned

Potion of Invisibility.Name: Potion of Invisibility
Potion of Invisibility.Description: A clear liquid that bends light around the drinker.

Effect.Invisibility: Become invisible until attacking or casting a spell

Potion of Fire Breath.Name: Potion of Fire Breath
Potion of Fire Breath.Description: A bubbling red liquid that grants the power to breathe fire.

Effect.Action: Can use action to breathe fire (15ft cone, 4d6 fire damage)
Effect.Save: DC 13 Dexterity save for half damage

Greater Healing Potion.Name: Greater Healing Potion
Greater Healing Potion.Description: A bright red potion with golden swirls that provides significant healing.

Effect.Bonus: Advantage on next Constitution save within 1 minute

Enchanted Quiver.Name: Enchanted Quiver
Enchanted Quiver.Description: A quiver that magically produces basic arrows.

Mystic's Spellbook.Name: Mystic's Spellbook
Mystic's Spellbook.Description: A spellbook with pages that rearrange themselves and crystalline bookmarks.

Effect.Protection: Resistant to fire and water damage
Effect.Memory: Advantage on checks to recall spells written within

Frost Brand Dagger.Name: Frost Brand Dagger
Frost Brand Dagger.Description: A dagger with a blade of magical ice that never melts.

Effect.Light: Sheds dim light in 10ft radius when drawn

Alchemist's Satchel.Name: Alchemist's Satchel
Alchemist's Satchel.Description: A leather satchel with numerous protective enchantments and specialized compartments.

Effect.Capacity: Can hold up to 20 potion-sized containers

Ring of Lockpicking.Name: Ring of Lockpicking
Ring of Lockpicking.Description: A silver ring that transforms into various lockpicking tools.

Effect.Conceal: Appears as normal ring when not in use

Echo Crystal.Name: Echo Crystal
Echo Crystal.Description: A crystal that can record and replay short sound sequences.

Effect.Record: Can record up to 1 minute of sound
Effect.Replay: Can replay recorded sound at will
